choices: Jade began to step on Jackie
Jade looked down and spotted Jackie
Viper came through the shop door
The black thugs came in, trying to turn over another new leaf
1.content: It was a peaceful day for once at Uncle's antique shop. Toru and Uncle were busy sweeping, Jackie was training, and Jade....well, was being the mischievous little girl she was. "I know I can get this spell right!" She said with confidence. She had, once again broken out the disappearing spell to test her homework's "disappearing ability". With the weird ingredients in the pot, and the words chanted, she blew the powder into the air. "Jade have youuuuaaahhggh! Phut!" Jackie spat as the powder went right in his face. "Jackie! oh no! I'm sor...ry? Uh...Jackie, where'd you go?" "Oh great again with the shrink spell, Jade?" Jackie groaned as he looked up at his now enourmous niece. Just then....
1.title: Just another Day in the Life of Jackie Chan

11.content:
as jackie looked around his surrounding and at his enormous unaware niece jade decided to go and get help

she began walking towards her room to try and find help

jackie looks up and sees his nieces enormous foot coming towards him

is she barefoot or shoes
11.title: Jade began to step on Jackie

choices: check what is in her sock
113.content:
jackie looked up to see his gigantic nieces bus sized sock crash nearby and immediatey saw her other foot hover above him

jackie jumps out the way just as it crashed infront of him. he immediately caught the smell of her foot. it smelt as if she hadn't washed her feet or socks in months, maybe years.

but to try and get help he had to climb her foot. he grabbed onto the socks and he immediatly felt the sweat in the sock and he sliped face first into jades titanic toes.

he got his face pit her sock and began to climb up it, the smell was making his eye water and he could barely see what was infront of him

he eventually got to top of jades behemoth foot and began to head towards her ankles
then suddenly jackie fell into a hole and landed inbetween jades putrid big and second toes

"jade help me" jackie yelled as he tried to climb out of the hole to no avail

jade began to wiggle her toes which where like earthquakes to jackie smashing him into jades sweaty toes he ended up sliding down under the ball of her foot with his head stuck inbetween her big and second toes

hours went by and jades big stinky toes kept jackie in place
he was getting thirsty, so very thirsty and he saw a few beads of sweat drip down inbetween jades big stinky toes

"i have beaten giant lizard demons and thousands of henchmen and i have been beaten by my ten year old nieces sweaty gigantic feet" jackie whined "i can't believe i have to do this"

he begins to lick the sweat off of her toes to drink

meanwhile
jade was going out so she began to put on her shoes when suddenly she felt something inbetween her toes but it felt really good and continues to put on her shoes

"whatever is happening inbetween my toes" jade says "keep going"

jackie couldn't believe what he heard his young niece was enjoying him licking inbetween her smelly sweaty feet

that night she laid down on her bed with her shoes still on and wondered whether she should check what was inbetween her toes

what now
113.title: socks

12.title: Jade looked down and spotted Jackie

info.brief_description:
Anything goes
Author's Note: This takes place between the 7 Dragons and DaulonWong season
info.description:
Jade once again attempts the disappearing spell, but once again, She goofs and hits jackie with a shrinking spell (or herself/Viper with a growing spell).
I allow everything EXCEPT GUY ON GUY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

JACKIE CAN NOT DIE IF HE SHRINKS!!!!!!!!
